Have been using cantera mostly within matlab, and I am wondering if 
their is a way to extract information about elemental composition of 
each species, such as a matrix containing elemental composition of 
species and vectors containing element and species names.  These 
would be very useful in automated initialization of the data for 
arbitrary mechanisms.

Thanks,

Dan Flowers
LLNL
